Actor ID.description: The ID of the actor (person, insitution, etc) that the image relates to

Image file name.description: The file name of the image

Image file date.description: The date the image file was created (format: YYYY/MM/DD)

Image order.description: The order in which this image appears for the object (painting, sample, etc), starting from 1

Image purpose.description: The purpose of the image (free text)

Image acquisition carried out by.description: The ID of the person who carried out the image acquisition (linked to Person)

Image resolution.description: Resolution of the image (pixels per mm)

Image re-use license.description: The URL of the license governing the reuse of the image

Image copyright.description: Copyright information related to the image

Image comment.description: Additional comments or notes about the image

Image IIIF info URL.description: The IIIF info URL for the image
